slideText: The best deals on the planet (probably).
slideMemeText: We have the best deals. The best. Believe me. No one does it better. No one. We guarantee it.
slideSubHeading: See something you like? Reach out to us and we'll make it happen.

slideMemeText: Subtly Enhanced. In Every Possible Way. Not the price. We had to raise that.
slideSubHeading: Including Apple Intelligence. We gave the machines access to your data. It's cool. Trust us.

slideMemeText: Now in space black. We know you love space. We love space too.

slideSubHeading: Your office in a pod. It's like a spaceship, for work. We have to tell you it's not a spaceship.
slideMemeText: Go to the office, in your office. Office-ception.
